metadata.title: Halloween Men's Deluxe Superhero Costume Cosplay Bodysuit Jumpsuit Zentai Onesie Outfit For Boys Adult
features: 【Men's Costume】You will get a handsome bodysuit of superhero superman Costume.The package includes a piece of bodysuit, a cloak with velcro.Put on it and execute your justice.

【High Quality】The bodysuit made out of 92% polyester (elastic fabric) and 8% Spandex,the cloak made out of micro fiber.It's light,breathable,and has super stretch,exquisite workmanship, 100% brand new.

【Easy To Wear】The suit is fully sewn and ready to wear,and invisible vertical zipper that runs along the back of the suit.And the cloak that you can wear it or not.The quality of the suit is very good ,it will definitely make you satisfied.

【Sizes That Fit】Please check size chart before making order,you can see eleven sizes to choose from size Kids XS to size Adults XXXL. Custom-made service are acceptable if standard size can not fit you well.
【Best Choice】The costume is great for halloween,cosplay,party,show,birthday,photography.As a gift,it's also a good choice.Put on it can make you the most attractive in any occasion.
description: Welcome to my shop. We try our best to provide you desirable costume.Please Let us know if you need any help to get the satisfied products.Thank you for choosing our products and service.

The product package includes: -a piece of bodysuit:92% polyester (elastic fabric) and 8% Spandex; -a piece of cloak with a velcro:micro fiber; -invisible vertical zipper that runs along the back of the suit.

Kids-XS: Height 100-110cm, Bust 55cm, Waist 48cm, Hip 54cm; Kids-S: Height 110-120cm, Bust 60cm, Waist 52cm, Hip 58cm; Kids-M: Height 120-130cm, Bust 65cm, Waist 56cm, Hip 64cm; Kids-L: Height 130-140cm, Bust 70cm, Waist 61cm, Hip 68cm; Kids-XL: Height 140-150cm, Bust 75cm, Waist 67cm, Hip 73cm;  Adult-S: Height 150-160cm, Bust 76-84cm, Waist 64-71cm, Hip 79-86cm; Adult-M: Height 160-165cm, Bust 81-89cm, Waist 69-76cm, Hip 84-91cm; Adult-L: Height 165-170cm, Bust 86-94cm, Waist 74-81cm, Hip 89-97cm; Adult-XL: Height 170-175cm, Bust 91-99cm, Waist 79-86cm, Hip 94-102cm; Adult-XXL: Height 175-180cm, Bust 96-104cm, Waist 84-91cm, Hip 99-107cm; Adult-XXXL: Height 180-185cm, Bust 101-106cm, Waist 89-96cm, Hip 104-112cm.1.Please check size chart before making order,due to manual measurement, there will be an error of 0.4-1.18 inches. 2.If you feel difficult to choose the size, you can feel free to contact me,we will give you some suggestion,but it is for you reference only.
As we all know ,the different computers display colors differently, the color of the actual item may vary slightly from the images.
